Reviews.Title: Good starter package
Reviews.Author: Darius Wiles
Reviews.Content: I bought this as my first digital SLR camera. I wanted a longer lens from Canon, in addition to the one that comes by default with the Rebel SL1, and this package was a cost effective way of buying it. This is especially true considering the many other items which are included. These are of reasonable quality, based on the ones I have used so far and on Amazon reviews of the individual items, and I have found that they are plenty good enough for someone new to digital SLR photography. When I bought my camera there were many similar packages including this camera and different additional items, so have a look for similar packages if you are interested in this camera but no so keen on the additional items in this specific package.The camera itself is fantastic. I've owned a Canon point-and-shoot camera for several years, so the controls are familiar, though this camera has many more settings. The manual and other small booklets that are bundled with the camera do a good job of explaining the controls and when to use them to get the best pictures. The quality of the photos is great.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with... CANON
Reviews.Author: Geraldine A. Fallon "Gerry"
Reviews.Content: The Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with...CANON came packed very secure all looks great.  This is a Christmas present so will further review after it is given. This was a great deal I would suggest to buy.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Huynh
Reviews.Content: Good camera and it is easy to handle, light weight, advanced technology and I have yet to discover all of the details of it.

Reviews.Title: lightweight!
Reviews.Author: Kalendrinn
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how lightweight this was.  I bought it for my wife for Christmas and the camera is a great camera for her.  It's smaller and super lightweight so it fits in her hands and she doesn't get uber tired holding it for photographs.  She took 3k during our volleyball tournament recently and the pictures were great.  She used the sport mode and got some pretty good pictures.  Only thing is the sport mode doesn't take pictures quite as fast as you might hope...missed a lot of perfect spikes with the hand on the ball (got the swing and follow through).  She's now taking a class to learn how to use it better and more effectively.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Sunil Gajraj
Reviews.Content: This was a really good package. Four stars because the spare battery was not a genuine Canon one. Really useful accessories. Excellent camera!

Reviews.Title: It  is super wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Jeanmarie Ann Endrizzi "happy person"
Reviews.Content: Love it!  I am thoroughly pleased with the camera .  It is very light and easy to use and I am glad  I purchased it,

Reviews.Title: timely delivery & all functional
Reviews.Author: Insu Lee
Reviews.Content: I've been playing with all I've got. And there are goods and bads but really I thought it was a really good deal and I'm quite happy with it.Good.- Camera- 2 18-55mm and 75-25mm  Lenses & UV protection lenses- SD cardBad- tele&wise; lense kit. (I tried them a few times. and now there are just sitting in my drawer)- cleaning kit (except air blower, just get yourself a brush for dusts, and microbifre cloth.)I haven't used remote, flash, tripod, etc.Camera bag, it is good if you intent to carry everything with youif you are a minimalist (like me) get a smaller bag for your camera body and 1 lens of your choice

Reviews.Title: Great camera and accesories
Reviews.Author: DARLA  THOMAS
Reviews.Content: I'm just starting to use it, but I'm loving the great pictures I can take with this camera, especially the night shots!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Saurabh
Reviews.Content: This is my first Digital SLR camera, outstanding results.There is absolutely nothing to complain about, great package by amazon and cameta camera

Reviews.Title: Canon SL1 bundle
Reviews.Author: Khoa Vo
Reviews.Content: Items received on time with well packaging. ..after 2 days bought this kit, the price dropped about $20...I contacted seller for discount and they offered me with $20 store credit right the way...I'm happy to do business with Cameta Camera.For the camera, it is very small, light and perfect for DSLR starter like me...

Reviews.Title: AMAZING price and package
Reviews.Author: Becca F.
Reviews.Content: I basically got all the accessories for free compared to department store prices.  This is Cannon USA and the camera is the exact same as you'd get in a department store.  The remote is really nice too. I am a new DSLR user, and am excited to learn how to use everything. I really like the remote control feature for taking my own family pictures.  It's not the most responsive, but I managed to get a picture of me, my hubby, 3 month old son, and dog all looking at the camera by holding the remote button and taking about 50 pictures.  We would not have had the patience to do 50 self timer pictures!

Reviews.Title: Great package deal!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is everything you need to get started and capture beautiful pictures ! Got it for my daughter for Xmas ,I know she will love it!

Reviews.Title: Cannon rebel SL1 package
Reviews.Author: Michele
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas... Was the best deal around with all the included accessories... I'll update when it arrives

<13> Precision Design SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> Precision Design 6pc Complete <13> Precision Design SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> Precision Design 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <15> Precision Design Memory Card Wallet + <16> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
